document_data.name: Shining Steel Mercenary Company
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shining Steel Mercenary Company''' was a disbanded mercenary company around [[1358 DR]].
document_data.History:
The Shining Steel originated as an adventuring party in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]. When the leaders of [[Spandeliyon]] asked for their help to defend the city from a pirate horde, they recruited more members and successfully defeated the pirates.

They decided to continued to act as mercenary group but always with the approach of an adventuring party. When the [[Grand Army of the Tuigan|Horde]] menaced [[Faer√ªn]], they decided to join the crusade of [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]], being hired by [[Sembia]]. During the war they fought well but were decimated. The few survivors continued on as an adventuring party.
